roleset.name: carry along with, move literally or metaphorically
roleset.note: BRING-V NOTES: Frames file for 'bring' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus. (from bring-v.01)

roles.note: Follow PReditor's suggestions for phrasal brings--the particle is often the same as an attribute, but they can cooccur (eg "bring in as president").

role.descr: attribute, state after bringing, secondary action

example.name: bring-v: active, attributive
example.text: The surge brings to nearly 50 the number of country funds that are listed in New York or London.
example.arg: the number of country funds that are listed in New York or London.

example.name: bring-v: with ablative
example.text: [They]-2 may risk *trace*-2 bringing some damaging influence from outside the markets.

example.name: bring-v: active, attributive again
example.text: Bush administration officials are looking to [the Fed]-1 *trace*-1 to bring down rates.

example.name: bring-v: passive, attributive
example.text: ...the Whiting field, the first of [five small fields]-2 scheduled *trace* to be brought *trace*-2 into production before the end of 1990.

example.name: bring_up-v: issues
example.text: The meeting brought up important issues that everyone ignored.

roleset.name: process criminal charges against
roleset.note: BRING-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from bring-v.07)

example.name: bring_up-v: I assume they mean Den Haag, not the Hollywood jazz club.
example.text: # 6 *PRO* Bringing Bush / Cheney up on criminal charges for war crimes . -LRB- send them to the Haig !!! -RRB-
example.arg: on criminal charges for war crimes

roleset.name: rear a child (or other growing entity)
roleset.note: BRING-V NOTES: Added by Julia during unification to correspond to 'upbringin-n.01'. (from bring-v.08)
UPBRINGING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, bring_up.08. Corresponds to VNcls establish-55.5-1. (from upbringing-n.01)

example.name: bring_up-v: args 0, 1
example.text: *PRO* Bringing up children is hard on a graduate student's wages.

example.name: bring_up-v: args 0, 1, 3
example.text: John had brought those frogs up from tadpoles.

example.name: bring_up-v: args 1,2
example.text: I-1 was brought up [*-1] Lutheran, but my wife was raised Catholic

example.name: upbringing-n
example.text: Now , in some cases , Mosuo men DO want to be involved in their own childrens ' upbringing .

example.name: upbringing-n
example.text: Some of my dearest friends have experienced considerable loss this year?death of loved ones, an unfaithful spouse, divorce, sickness, and children changing from doting loving children to unyielding, wild running, untamed horses?resisting their upbringing of godly teachings.

example.name: upbringing-n
example.text: Since 1992, the Wooden Stars have fused together their upbringing of jazz, post-punk, and indie to result in a sound of flowing, guitar-driven ballads.

example.name: upbringing-n
example.text: Her upbringing of Shivaji is a subject of folklore.

roleset.name: make fall
roleset.note: BRING-V NOTES: I don't know that all of these will be needed, but here they are justin case. (from bring-v.03)

example.name: bring_down-v: the government
example.text: The vote could have brought down Pakistan's government.

example.name: bring along-v
example.text: She could bring along her humility and a little thespian skill.
example.arg: her humility and a little thespian skill

roleset.name: cause to be
roleset.note: BRING-V NOTES: VerbNet classes engender-27, establish-55.5-1. (from bring-v.05)

example.name: bring_about-v: and there was light
example.text: ``You're telling someone [they]*-1 can spend the next three or four or five or six years of their life [*-1] bringing about the most difficult and costly modernization of an information system on the civil side ever,'' Mr. Goldberg said.
example.arg: the most difficult and costly modernization of an information system on the civil side ever

roleset.name: cause onset
roleset.note: BRING-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from bring-v.06)

example.name: bring_on-v: Both args
example.text: I do n't want to guess their specific motives , but it seems to me that such an arrangement could be very advanategous for those nations in the event of a crisis brought * on by peak oil .
